tool_description: Monitors and reports real-time status of storage bins including occupancy levels, item contents, and operational availability.

bin_ids.description: List of bin identifiers to monitor

include_contents.description: Include detailed item contents in the status report

alert_thresholds.description: Check bins against capacity alert thresholds

error_messages: Invalid bin_ids: One or more bin identifiers do not exist in the warehouse system.
Too many bins: Maximum 500 bins can be monitored in a single request.
Empty bin_ids: At least one bin ID must be provided.
usage: Provide an array of bin_ids to monitor. Set include_contents to true for detailed inventory lists, and alert_thresholds to true for capacity warnings.

bin_statuses.description: Array of bin status summaries with occupancy and availability

alerts.description: Any capacity or status alerts for the monitored bins

last_updated.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the status was last refreshed
